game.name: Trivia Vault: Fashion Trivia
game.shortDescription: Welcome to the Trivia Vault contestant! Play as a contestant in a gameshow called Trivia Vault Fashion Trivia and bring your thinking hat. Answer fashion trivia questions as quickly as you can, the faster you answer the higher the cash value
game.shortDescriptionEn: Welcome to the Trivia Vault contestant! Play as a contestant in a gameshow called Trivia Vault Fashion Trivia and bring your thinking hat. Answer fashion trivia questions as quickly as you can, the faster you answer the higher the cash value
